text: @BBCNews @bbclaurak This tells you just how broke the British treasury is. The exchequer has no money or plans to help the citizens of Britain. Their is no funds for anybody or any big projects needed to be done. This is how it will be in Britain for the next 15 - 20 years at least. #COVID19
